title: Hacked
body: My Friend got hacked but we dont know how to get it backed and he have more then 15k Money on the acc. How do we fix it??

replies.body: Have you friend go over our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to get his account back.  If he's still having trouble regaining access, he can submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can help out.  I appreciate your looking out for your friend, but keep in mind that we'll only be able to speak with the account owner and not a third party.  Good luck!
